import { Component } from 'react'; import './randomChar.scss'; import mjolnir from '../../resources/img/mjolnir.png'; import { render } from '@testing-library/react'; class RandomChar extends Component { state = { name: null, description: null, thumbnail: null, homepage: null, wiki: null } render () { const {name, description, thumbnail, homepage, wiki} = this.state; return (

{name}

{description}

homepage
Wiki

Random character for today!
Do you want to get to know him better?

Or choose another one

) } } export default RandomChar;
